vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Naphtali living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.24;
son of: Naphtali (H5321);
brother of: Jahzeel (H3183), Jezer (H3337) and Shillem (H8006)
Group of gu.ni (גּוּנִי "Guni" H1476)
§ Gunites = "my defender (?)"
a member of the family of Guni, son of Naphtali
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Neftalí; (b)   hombre; tribu de Gad; (c)   descendiente de Guní, hijo de Neftalí
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沽尼族 这个形容詞在希伯來文的意思是 "我的防禦者(?)"
沽尼的家族成員, 拿弗他利的子孫(民 26:48)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沽尼族 这个形容词在希伯来文的意思是 "我的防御者(?)"
沽尼的家族成员, 拿弗他利的子孙(民 26:48)
